title: Rodrigo Marques
text:
I am an Invited Assistant at the Department of Computer Science of the University of Porto, and Collaborator at LIACC working with Mário Florido and Pedro Vasconcelos.
My research focus is on the foundations of computation. I believe that studies in programming languages and in constructive logics help in advancing our understanding of programming.
Before this, I obtained a MSc degree in Computer Science with a focus on Reliable Computation at the University of Porto.
